title: Jon Hamm linked to Sandra Bullock after splitting with long-time girlfriend Jennifer Westfeld | The
text:
MAD Men star Jon Hamm and his long-time partner Jennifer Westfeldt have reportedly split after 16 years together.
Hamm, 44, has not been seen with Westfeldt since he entered rehab in January for alcoholism.
Hollywood Life reports the pair broke up due to Hamm’s reluctance to have a baby with the 45-year-old actress.
Rumours ... Jon Hamm and Sandra Bullock at the Los Angeles premiere of Minions last month. Source: AP
Other reports have linked him to his Minions co-star Sandra Bullock.
The actor — whose iconic role as Don Draper ended with the finale of Mad Men after seven seasons — has previously spoken of his reluctance to have kids.
Troubled ... Jon Hamm pictured in January, the month he entered rehab for alcohol addiction. Source: AP
“I don’t have a driving force to have a baby,” he said. “That said, I’m in a committed relationship, and if it ever came up. I’m not ruling it out. Hollywood break-ups
Originally published as Single Jon Hamm linked to Sandra Bullock
